data.Title: Google Releases June 2024 Spam Update
data.Description: Google released a spam update in June 2024. Details about the update are still emerging.

data.Title: Google Search Indexing Issue Resolved
data.Description: Google has addressed a recent indexing issue that was impacting the visibility of new content on the search engine. The issue was acknowledged by Google and documented on its Search Status dashboard.

data.Title: Google AI Overviews Showing Less Often
data.Description: Google's AI Overviews are appearing less frequently in search results, now showing up for an average of 7-9% of queries. Additionally, Reddit is no longer among the top 10 most cited domains in these overviews.

data.Title: Google Tests Floating Search Bar in Discover
data.Description: Google is testing a floating search bar in the Google Discover results.

data.Title: Google to Make Movie and TV Reviews Public
data.Description: Starting on June 24th, Google will make users' movie and TV reviews public under a new profile page.

data.Title: Local Service Ads Coming to Google Maps
data.Description: Local Service Ads are being integrated into Google Maps on iOS devices, providing businesses with another avenue to reach potential customers. However, there is currently no option to opt out of this feature without disabling Local Service Ads entirely.

data.Title: Universal Analytics Data to be Deleted July 1
data.Description: July 1: Users will lose access to Universal Analytics data and interface. After July 1: All Universal Analytics data will be permanently deleted.

data.Title: Google Image Thumbnails Disappearing from Search Results
data.Description: Google may be removing image thumbnails from search result snippets due to quality issues with the website.
